title: Ep 503 | Jase Dines in the Lines of a Russian McDonald's & What Inflation Really Means for Believers
description:
Jase tells a hilarious story about the time he was leaving Ukraine with a crate of cash and had not eaten for five days. Zach discusses inflation throughout history and paints an image of why we do not put our faith in the physical treasures of this world. Jase explores the idea that the builder of the house has greater honor than the house itself and discusses Christians' temptation to worship creation rather than the creatOR. 

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Get "Your Daily Phil: 100 Days of Truth and Freedom to Heal America's Soul" by Phil Robertson, available now: https://www.amazon.com/dp/1400235936
